title: 2 water front condos,2 bedroom and a studio on edgewater drive  lakewo
posting_body: I have both a 2 bedroom and a studio condo in the lakehouse condominium on the water on edgewater drive Lakewood.

Both have views of lake Erie from the dining room.the 2 bedroom is 1300 a month and that includes all utilities, indoor parking permit space,stainless steel fridge,stove,dishwasher,microwave, and garbage disposal.gym,pool,grill and picnic area,intercom speaker to buzz people in,fob key for doors,
..........the studio is 950 and also includes all utilities but no indoor parking reserved spot.
This is a very sought after building due to all utilities included.also beautiful roof top to lay out and look across the lake .blocks from edgewater park and beach.
No credit or background check but must have solid employment.
This is high rise luxury living on a budget.
,the average 2 bedroom unit in this building starts at 1800 so grab this while you can
